thread.title: Mellanox Technologies, Ltd. to Host Analyst Day on October 23, 2015
thread.title_full: Mellanox Technologies, Ltd. to Host Analyst Day on October 23, 2015

title: Mellanox Technologies, Ltd. to Host Analyst Day on October 23, 2015
text:
Mellanox Technologies, Ltd. to Host Analyst Day on October 23, 2015 October 08, 2015 08:30 AM Eastern Daylight Time 
SUNNYVALE, Calif. & YOKNEAM, Israel--( BUSINESS WIRE )--MellanoxÂ® Technologies, Ltd. (NASDAQ: MLNX), a leading supplier of high-performance, end-to-end interconnect solutions for data center servers and storage systems, today announced that it will host its annual Analyst Day on Friday, October 23, 2015, in New York City from 8:30 a.m. until approximately 1:30 p.m. Eastern Time. Members of the Mellanox executive team will provide an overview of the company's vision, strategy, business initiatives, partnerships, products and financial goals. 
The event will be available to the public via a live webcast at http://ir.mellanox.com . To listen to the live event and view the corresponding presentations, please go to the Web site at least 15 minutes early to register, download and install any necessary audio software. A replay of the event, including presentation materials, will be available within 24 hours after the event. 
About Mellanox 
Mellanox Technologies is a leading supplier of end-to-end InfiniBand and Ethernet interconnect solutions and services for servers and storage. Mellanox interconnect solutions increase data center efficiency by providing the highest throughput and lowest latency, delivering data faster to applications and unlocking system performance capability. Mellanox offers a choice of fast interconnect products: adapters, switches, software, cables and silicon that accelerate application runtime and maximize business results for a wide range of markets including high-performance computing, enterprise data centers, Web 2.0, cloud, storage and financial services. More information is available at www.mellanox.com . 
Mellanox is a registered trademark of Mellanox Technologies, Ltd. All other trademarks are property of their respective owners. Contacts
